item.title: Elasticsearch
item.description: Python high-level library that allows to use Elasticsearch: elasticsearch-dsl The elasticsearch-dsl provide a usage of classes while writing/reading from elastic. The bulk upload still needs to be handled through json format (usually Object.to_dict(include_meta=True) is sufficient) provided by elasticsearch.helpers. See Patricâ€™s post showing a neat example of elastic usage.
